CustomField.description:
Defines which Timesheets will be included in the cross-assignment interpretation process.
Approved - Only Timesheets that meet the cross-assignment criteria wth an Approval Status of 'Approved' will be processed for cross-assignment interpretation.
All - All Timesheets that meet the cross-assignment criteria will be processed for cross-assignment interpretation.
CustomField.inlineHelpText:
Defines which Timesheets will be included in the cross-assignment interpretation process.
Approved - Only Timesheets that meet the cross-assignment criteria wth an Approval Status of 'Approved' will be processed for cross-assignment interpretation.
All - All Timesheets that meet the cross-assignment criteria will be processed for cross-assignment interpretation.
CustomField.label: Cross Assignment Timesheet Status
